alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hardin County through 100 PM CDT... At 1230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Olive Hill to near Pickwick Dam. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Pickwick Landing State Park, Walnut Grove, Olive Hill, Pickwick Dam, Michie, Counce, Lowryville, Damon, Southside, Hamburg, Pollards Mill, Phillips, Bruton Branch, Childers Hill, Center Star, Maddox, Swift, Walkertown and Olivehill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
